messages: You have a strange dream about lizards.
Your dreams give you a strange scaly feeling.
You have a strange dream about being a patient in a frightening hospital.
Your dreams give you an oddly medicated feeling.
You have a strange dream about birds.
Your dreams give you a strange feathered feeling.
You have a strange dream about fish.
Your dreams give you a strange wet, scaly feeling.
You have a strange dream about animals.
Your dreams give you a strange furry feeling.
You have a strange dream about bears.
Your dreams give you a rough furry feeling.
You have a strange dream about cats.
Your dreams give you a sleek furry feeling.
You have a strange dream about wolves.
Your dreams give you a thick furry feeling.
You have a strange dream about cattle.
Your dreams give you a strange content, furry feeling.
You have a strange dream about insects.
Your dreams give you a strange chitinous feeling.
You have a strange dream about plants.
Your dreams give you a strange plantlike feeling.
You have a strange dream about slime.
Your dreams give you a strange slimy feeling.
You have a strange dream about living in a cave.
Your dreams give you a strange reclusive feeling.
You have a strange dream about sea creatures.
Your dreams give you a strange wet feeling.
You have a strange dream about spiders.
Your dreams give you a strange webbed feeling.
You have a strange dream about rats.
Your dreams give you a strange fuzzy feeling.
You have a strange dream.
You feel... OK.
You have a strange dream.
You feel a yearning...
You dream about the zoo, for some reason.
Your dreams... are complex and multifaceted.
You dream of the tropics.
You feel warm.
You dream of a massive block of cheese bigger than you.
You dream of being cozy in a dark place.
You dream of a strange quest for a bush that grows gray apples.
You feel like you're cracking a combination lock.
Red, blue, and yellow cancel each other out, don't they?
Red, blue, and yellow add together, don't they?
You have a disturbing dream of bathing in the sun on a rock.
While dreaming, you see a distinctively lizard-like reflection of yourself.
You have a disturbing dream of undergoing strange medical procedures.
While dreaming, you see yourself dressed in a hospital gown, receiving treatment.
You have strange dreams of soaring through the sky.
In a dream, you see a curiously birdlike reflection of yourself.
You dream of swimming in the open ocean
In your dream, you see a strangely fishlike image of yourself.
You have a vivid dream of hunting in the woods.
Whilst dreaming, you see a disturbingly bestial version of yourself.
You dream of foraging in the woods... mouth-first?
Your dream-reflection is rather bearish.
You easily bound from the street to a roof..oh, only a dream.
As you dream, your reflection looks rather catlike.
You have a disturbing dream of someone invading your territory.
Your dream-self's muzzle looks... wait, muzzle?
You dream of grazing in an open field.
In a dream you catch a glimpse of a strangely cattle-like image of yourself.
You have a dream of working in a hive.
While dreaming you look into a mirror and see a frighteningly insectoid reflection.
You have a confusing dream of growing in a garden.
You are confused by a plantlike image of yourself in a dream.
You have a strange dream of living in sludge.
In your dream you see an odd, slimy reflection of yourself.
You dream of living deep inside a dark cave.
You dream of being a primitive cave dweller.
You dream of living on the ocean floor.
While dreaming, a reflection of yourself appears almost like an octopus.
You have a strange dream of spinning webs
In your dream you see a very spiderlike version of yourself.
You vividly dream of living in the sewers.
In your dream you see a group of rats that look almost like yourself.
You dream of having that success you knew you deserved, back before all this.
Your dream-self looks competent and in control.
You dream of a home in the forests.
You feel beautiful, and yet riven with worry...
You can't quite work out what the dream is about... it just keeps changing.
Your dream is filled with creatures, and yet all seem like you.
You dream of stalking some sort of lizard... no, that can't be right, can it?
For some reason you dream of your shoes.  They don't fit, and nothing seems to help...
You dream of... sneaking.
You dream of a cold winter night.  Your jacket is too big to put on.
You are terrified by a dream of becoming a lizard hybrid.
You have a disturbingly lifelike dream of living as a lizard.
You have a dream of doctors and nurses doing unnatural things to your body, which brings you perverse pleasure.
You have a vivid dream of being a medical anomaly, as your heartbeat syncs with the steady drip of an IV line.
You have a realistic dream of flying south with your flock for the winter.
You are disturbed when your birdlike dreams are more lifelike than reality.
You have a disturbing dream of swimming with a school of fish.
When you wake up you panic about drowning from being out of water.
You vividly dream of running with your pack, hunting a wild animal.
A terrifyingly real dream has you killing game with your bare teeth.
Your dream of raiding a giant beehive has you licking your... muzzle in anticipation.
In your dream, you stalk and kill a young wolf, using only your teeth and claws.
A warm, sunny spot high up where you can watch your prey.  What a great dream!
You dream of pursuing and killing a rat, for some reason.
You dream of tearing into a fresh kill.
You dream of finally finding the perfect place to make your den.
You terrifyingly dream of being led to a slaughterhouse by a farmer.
You find it hard to wake from a vivid dream of grazing on a farm.
You are terrified by a dream of serving the hive queen mindlessly.
Your disturbingly lifelike dream has you pollinating plants.
You have a confusing and scary dream of becoming a plant.
The transition from your lifelike dreams of living as a plant to reality shocks you.
Your vivid dream of living as a slime blob frightens you.
You find it hard to control your limbs after dreaming of amorphous blob life.
Your dream of living in the dark for years is almost real.
You are frightened of the outside after your vivid dream of cave life.
Your dreams of living on the ocean floor seem more lifelike than reality.
You dream of living as a terrifying octopus mutant.
You vividly dream of living in a web and consuming insects.
Your dreams of fully turning into a spider frighten you.
You scream in fear while you dream of being chased by a cat
Your lifelike dreams have you scavenging food with a pack of rats.
You see yourself, five years from now, as the leader of a successful city.
Your success in restoring civilization was only a dream.  For now.
NO!  You will not allow this corruption to prevail!
You see yourself reflected in the beauty of the forest.
You are many animals, and yet one.
Hoof.  Talon.  Tooth.  Fight.  Feed.  Forward.
You've never felt so lithe and powerful.
After an exciting and tasty hunt, you retire to your nest.  Mmm, yes, nest.
You weave between the zombies' legs, too small for them to catch.  The gas station isn't far now, with all its soda and chips and- UGH, dream...
Once you finish your tasty dinner of seeds, you look around for your drink, but you already ate it.
You are terrified by a dream of becoming an ape hybrid.
You blissfully recall days spent lounging in the sun.
You dream of your legions of undead admirers, their attentions, and the wonderful pain.
You have a vivid dream of being a medical anomaly, as your heartbeat syncs with the steady drip of an IV line.
You wonder if your nest will be good enough.
Your dream of soaring over the landscape becomes a nightmare when you find yourself with arms and a glider!
You have a comforting dream of swimming with a school of fish.
The thought of being out of water, forced to crawl unsupported, terrifies you.
You vividly dream of sharing a kill with your pack.
A fond memory of throating some prey animal bubbles up.
You wonder if you could find one of those 'salmon runs', or if they were just a legend...
Ah, the wolf-slaying dream again.  That's a good one...
Boing!  and you've pounced another yummy critter.
Your nightmare of sentient rats turns successful, as you grab their King and shake it apart!
You dream of the hunt, the feed, and your pack.
Oh, you should really patrol your territory again, maybe expand.
You dream of jumping the gate and leading your herd to freedom.
The herd moves along and you with them, finding greener pastures.
You feel smug, knowing that the Queen is dependent on you.
You dream of a weirdly shaped plant, whose nectar surpassed your every wish...
You dream of bees fighting over your sweet nectar.  Mmm.
How grand it would be to sink your roots deep into the soil as the seasons pass you by.
You dream of a gigantic knot of roots, beating like a heart.
You have a disturbing dream of termites chewing all over your body.
A rather attractive triffid offers you a bouquet of ape heads.  How thoughtful!
Your vivid dream of your pseudopods calcifying into rigid structures terrifies you.
Ah, the painting-the-planet dream again.  Maybe if you assimilated more...
The years seem to fly past as you dream of carving great underground fastnesses.
You have a horrible nightmare of being caught out in the sunlight.
Mmm.  The shellfish dream again.  Yum!
You dream of recruiting a cult of fishfolk to serve your needs.
You excitedly web up an interloper and prepare to feast... nope, dream.
Your dreams of having to live without a web frighten you.
The Fury is so big!  It's GONNA GET YOAAAAAH! *pant* only a dream.
You find your paws twitching.  There's a cave.  You should go.
You dream of the peaceful world you'll give humankind.  Because no one else can.
There are underground Faults in the world.  Faults you should remedy.
You pant, terrified at the thought of that FUNGUS destroying your home!
You wish others could understand, and join your struggle...
Your body flows slightly faster than you expected... oh, just a dream.
FIGHT.  FEED.  FORWARD.
Oh.  No, that 'rex' thing was only a myth.
You stir, saddened that your beautiful hatchlings were only a dream.
You curl up some more in your nest.  Geez, shredded paper really *is* comfy.
You hear the sirens again, but this time you stay in your hole in the wall.  Nobody will think to look there!

//: The Mycus is ONLY post-thresh, so many more here.
messages: We have been waiting a long time for a place such as this.
We will raise bountiful orchards and beautiful gardens.
The walking plants seek to harness us as a food source.  We will not allow that.
Our colonists are limitless.  We shall adapt to this world, as we adapt to all.
Non-Mycus sometimes reject the Marloss.  Our colonial efforts flourish with broad-minded guidance.
The seething masses attempt to wall non-Mycus away from the Marloss.  We will adapt and defeat them.
